name: Futbol: Kick Soccer Game
description:
This is a football game that can be played as a single player (player vs AI) or 2-Players (two players on the same device).

How to play:
You should select and drag on your units to adjust the power and direction of the shoot. There is also plenty of defensive and offensive formation available to play the game with tactics and strategy.

Furthermore, you can play "Tournament" and "Penalty Kicks" modes.

Download this addictive game and you will love it!
